name: Alvo
summary:
*Now crossplay with all major VR Headsets

 Faster-paced gameplay provides an experience like no other, in this accessible, VR Shooter.

Gain the edge on the battlefield by running, jumping, sliding, crawling and more to find the lethal shot.

Features-
Manual and automatic reload
Play standing or seated
Perk System
Killstreaks
Progression
Variety of guns, melee equipment and grenades
Leaderboard
Game Modes- Free for All, Team Death Match/TDM Hardpoint, Search and Destroy, 4 Player Coop...
